Make a figure of the ghost.
Recite the mantra while cutting it into pieces with a sword.
Perform homa for seven days, and they will be cured.

use ox gall to write this mantra.
Wear it, and they will be cured.
Furthermore, if a child is afflicted by ghosts,
write this mantra and wear it, and they will be cured.
